Uses of Class
com.moomoohk.Grame.Core.Grid

  • Packages that use Grid 
    Package Description
    com.moomoohk.Grame.Basics
    Contains some helpful classes which utilize the core.
    com.moomoohk.Grame.Basics.AI
    Contains some MovementAI classes.
    com.moomoohk.Grame.Core
    Contains the core classes of the engine.
    com.moomoohk.Grame.Core.Graphics
    Contains graphics related classes such as Render types.
    com.moomoohk.Grame.GrassMuncher
    A demo game I made with Grame.
    com.moomoohk.Grame.test
    Contains some test classes which shouldn't be touched or interacted with.

      Will return an Coordinates[] which contains all the sets of coordinates which are adjacent to this set in a certain Grid but are not necessarily in that same Grid.

      Checks whether all the adjacent sets of coordinates contain a GrameObject in a certain Grid.
